content: I believe disrupting the system is the epitome of entrepreneurial creativity and leadership. This is precisely why my company created our app. It’s super disruptive to empower people and enrich their lives. I have had many people lament the impossibility creating such an app only to find we have just launched. The leader must stay focused and strong along with building a great team. It’s going to be an amazing adventure. Hooray for dreamers with grit.
